citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 pm on
22-Jun-17. The undersigned inspector contacted the registrant by phone after arriving at the facility. The registrant
indicated that he was a couple of hours away.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 pm on
22-Jun-17.  The undersigned inspector contacted the registrant by phone after arriving at the facility.  The registrant
indicated that he was a couple of hours away.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
